LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerReceptor.label: Приемник WPN
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerReceptor.description: Требуется подключить к действительной WPN для обеспечения питания.
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPortablePowerReceptor.des: Требуется подключить к действительной WPN для обеспечения питания. Мощность снижена из-за небольших габаритов.
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerEmitter.label: Излучатель WPN
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerEmitter.description: A wireless power emitter device used to broadcast over long distance a WPN. Caution this device is sensitive to weather conditions (thunderstorms)
LanguageData.ARKPPP_WirelessPowerEmitterAdvanced.desc: A wireless power emitter device used to broadcast over long distance a WPN.
LanguageData.ARKPPP_LocalWirelessPowerEmitter.label: LWPN emitter
LanguageData.ARKPPP_LocalWirelessPowerEmitter.descrip: A device used to build local (on the current map) wireless powergrid (LWPN), which allow to connect every electrical devices without cables
LanguageData.ARKPPP_LocalWirelessPortablePowerEmitter: A portable device used to build local (on the current map) wireless powergrid (LWPN), which allow to connect every electrical devices without cables. Caution because of its small dimensions, it can handle limited wireless devices
LanguageData.ARKPPP_PowerBeamAbsorptionDish.label: Absorption Dish
LanguageData.ARKPPP_PowerBeamAbsorptionDish.descripti: A giant absorption dish destined to gather power from the ancient satellites network
LanguageData.ARKPPP_PowerBeamSatelliteTargetingSystem: A supercomputer used to hack and control one of the ancient satellites. In addition to having to be constantly cooled, no abrupt desynchronization with the satellite should take place, because it can have very serious repercussions. Thus start and stop init sequences must always be respected !
LanguageData.ARKPPP_ADRelayTower.label: AD relay tower
LanguageData.ARKPPP_ADRelayTower.description: Radio Antenna used to remotelly connect one or more "Absorrion Dishes"(ADs) to a Satelite Targetting System (STS) via the satelite network
